attributes.action: Resign, we do not need a coward as a Prime Minister without a Mandate from the people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown has led the people on to believe he may go for a General Election in November, now he has refused why?  If he thinks his policies are right for the Country what does he have to fear?  Is it because he knows his policies are wrong for the voters of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
